attributes.action: WALES ON THE FLAG OF THE UNION BY THE OLYMPICS 2012.
attributes.additional_details: The issue is in the title it is to force the issue over Wales being on the flag of the Union before the start of the Olympics and to ensure that the issue is taken seriously, and that is cannot be swept under the carpet, especially in regards’ to the fact that if Scotland becomes independent the current flag will lose it current validity.  Also the purpose of this is to force the UK government to fly the dragon next to the fag of the union during the Olympics’ of "2012" regardless of "IOC" rules..
